{{Han compound|至|刀|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=to arrive}}.

{{zh-forms}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[arrive]] at a [[destination]]; to [[reach]] a destination; to [[get to]]
#: {{zh-x|火車 到 了|The train has '''arrived'''.}}
# to [[go]] to; to [[leave]] for
#: {{zh-x|我 到 機場 接 你。|I'll '''go to''' the airport to pick you up.}}
# {{n-g|used as a [[verbal]] [[complement]] to indicate the (successful) [[completion]] of an action}}
#: {{zh-x|找到|to have found something}}
#* {{zh-x|做到|to have achieved something}}
#* {{zh-x|聽到|to have heard something}}
#* {{zh-x|你 怎麼 沒有 聽 到 我 的 敲門 聲？|How did you not hear my knocking on the door?}}
# {{lb|zh|usually in the negative}} to [[reach]]
#* {{zh-x|他 體重 不到 五十 公斤。|He weighs less than fifty kilograms.}}
# to the [[extent]] that
#* {{zh-x|佢 嘈 到 我 瞓 唔 著[着]{zoek6}。|He is '''so''' noisy '''that''' I couldn't go to sleep.|C}}
# [[to]]
## [[to]] (a place)
##* {{zh-x|他 到 中國 去 了。|He has gone '''to''' China.}}
##* {{zh-x|我 最近 搬 到 這 個 地區。|I recently moved '''to''' this area.}}
## [[to]] (a time); [[until]]; [[up to]]
##* {{zh-x|這 家 店 從 9 點 開 到 18 點。|This shop is open from 9 '''to''' 6 o'clock.}}
##* {{zh-x|我們 要 把 假{jià}期 推遲 到 天氣 好些 的 時候。|We shall delay our holiday '''until''' the weather is better.}}
## (from) ... [[to]] ...
##* {{zh-x|作業 是 第 一 題 到 第 八 題。|The homework is problems #1 to #8.}}
# [[thoughtful]]; [[considerate]]
